title: Ground
body_cue: Breath enters through your nose; feel weight in your heels.
micro: Press your toes lightly into the earth.
desire: Presence begins from below; let your mind catch up to your body.

title: Light Intake
body_cue: The first light, natural or lamp glow.
micro: Lift your gaze; open your chest.

title: Hydration Reset
micro: Take one slow sip with attention.
desire: The signal returns; your system heard you.

title: Orientation
body_cue: What day wants from you, not the other way.
micro: Name one micro-intention aloud.

title: Body Anchor
micro: Move that area once; shake or tap lightly.

title: Temperature Anchor
micro: Cool your wrists or neck.

title: Hydration Reset
body_cue: Taste the water; feel its temperature.
micro: One mindful sip.

title: Micro-Pause
micro: Release your shoulders on an exhale.

title: Transition Field
body_cue: The shift from doing to being.
micro: Dim one light; lengthen your exhale.

title: Body Decompression
body_cue: Your jaw, your chest, your hands.
micro: Shake them gently or stretch once.

title: Warmth Reset
micro: Wrap or warm that zone.

title: Closure Phrase
micro: Whisper, "Enough for today."

title: Stillness Signal
body_cue: The hum of devices or thought.
micro: Mute one source of sound.

title: Temperature Ground
micro: Adjust blanket or airflow.

title: Hydration Final
micro: Swallow with gratitude.

title: Dream Invocation
micro: Invite it forward.

title: Overwhelm
body_cue: Breath slows; name three points of contact.
micro: Choose one micro-intention only.

title: Low Motivation
body_cue: The small pulse of life under your ribs.
micro: Stretch your hands upward; feel space widen.

title: Mental Loop
body_cue: The phrase repeating in your mind.
micro: Speak it once aloud, then smile.

title: Social Drain from Dreams
micro: Send one simple note of gratitude.

title: Sensory Overload
micro: Step outside or soften your gaze.

title: Decision Fatigue
micro: Flip a coin for one small thing.

title: Tension Loop
micro: Tap your forearm three times; exhale through sound.

title: Disconnection
micro: Name its color; touch the ground.

title: Irritability
micro: Place hands under warm water.

title: Loneliness
micro: Message one safe friend or memory.

title: Overthinking
micro: Write three short phrases; fold the page.

title: Emotional Residue
body_cue: The film of the day on your skin.
micro: Brush arms downward; whisper "clear."

title: Restlessness
micro: Hand on heart; count four beats.

title: Guilt Spiral
micro: Place a note of thanks beside you.

title: Lonely Mind-Chatter
micro: Imagine the moon breathing with you.

title: Physical Ache
micro: Press that spot; name it "alive."

title: Energized
micro: Stand in light; inhale possibility.

title: Clear
micro: Tidy one small area.

title: Connected
body_cue: The thread between you and the world.
micro: Speak kindness once; receive it fully.

title: Creative Flow
body_cue: The first image or word that arrives.
micro: Write it down; let it unfold.

title: Focused
micro: Ground feet; breathe into task.

title: Collaborative
micro: Mirror tone; offer one harmonic idea.

title: Playful
micro: Change posture; say one word backward.

title: Curious
micro: Ask, "What else could this mean?"

title: Grateful
micro: Name them softly.

title: Soft Joy
micro: Hum with it; let lips curve.

title: Fulfilled
body_cue: The echo of a completed day.
micro: Write one line—"I was alive in…"

title: Intimate
micro: Touch it gently; say "Thank you for staying."

title: Peaceful
micro: Inhale slowly; exhale softer.

title: Dream-Ready
body_cue: The story forming behind your eyes.
micro: Whisper your seed intention.

title: Restored
micro: Name one thing done well.

title: Infinite
micro: Imagine dissolving into the wider breath.
desire: You are part of the field.
